entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
